title: "Machine Learning Identifies Patient Response to Sarilumab in Rheumatoid Arthritis"
excerpt: "Machine learning identified patients with rheumatoid arthritis who may have an increased chance of achieving clinical response with sarilumab, with those selected also showing an inferior response to adalimumab."
